songs.title: Lost Weekend
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Party time, party time, party time
Come on, come on, come on, come on

[Verse 1]
It's party time every day, kill the lights, celebrate
Like we're loaded, loaded, loaded, loaded on life
DJ killing it, losing it like we're kids
Like I'm loaded, loaded, loaded on life

[Pre-Chorus]
We want to watch the sun come up
I want to taste your magic tongue
La-la-la

[Chorus]
Lost weekend, weekend, la-la-la
Lost weekend, weekend
Let's get twisted with our friends
La-la-la, lost weekend, weekend

[Verse 2]
Glitter and making out, bubblegum in my mouth
Like we're loaded, loaded, loaded, loaded on love
Out our minds, in the end we're animals, aliens
'Cause I'm loaded, loaded, loaded, loaded on love

[Pre-Chorus]
We want to watch the sun come up
I want to taste your magic tongue
La-la-la

[Chorus]
Lost weekend, weekend, la-la-la
Lost weekend, weekend
Let's get twisted with our friends
La-la-la, lost weekend, weekend

[Bridge]
Breaking into parties, waking up in the bath tubs
Bottles in my backpack, fuck the silly night clubs
Groping all the rockstars that we've never heard of
Because too much, too much is never, ever enough
La-la-la

[Chorus]
Lost weekend, weekend, la-la-la
Lost weekend, weekend
Let's get twisted with our friends
La-la-la, lost weekend, weekend
Lost weekend, weekend, la-la-la
Lost weekend, weekend
Let's get twisted with our friends
La-la-la, lost weekend, weekend

[Outro]
Ready to go, ready to go
Do it again, lost weekend
Ready to go, ready to go
Do it again, lost weekend
